{{Description|No matter the perfume, it will begin to change the instant it comes into contact with the air, before finally dissipating amidst the whispers of wind, trees, and grass. In that sense, no two people will appreciate the exact same fragrance.<br>So it is for the paths taken by all who live. In that sense, you can consider perfumes an explication of human life.}}
